trans-unit.source: <noframes> can be used to present a message explaining that the user's browser doesn't support frames, but ideally should be used to present an alternate form of the site that doesn't use frames but still offers the same or similar functionality.
trans-unit.target: <noframes> 可以用于显示一条消息，说明用户的浏览器不支持框架，但理想情况下，应该用于呈现不使用框架但仍提供相同或相似功能的网站的替代形式。

trans-unit.source: <object> elements
trans-unit.target: <object> 元素

trans-unit.source: <plaintext> is deprecated since HTML 2, and not all browsers implemented it. Browsers that did implement it didn't do so consistently.
trans-unit.target: <plaintext> 从HTML 2开始不推荐使用<plaintext>，并不是所有的浏览器都实现了它。实施它的浏览器并不一致。

trans-unit.source: <plaintext> is obsolete in HTML5; browsers that accept it may instead treat it as a <pre> element that still interprets HTML within.
trans-unit.target: <plaintext> 在HTML5中已作废；接受它的浏览器可能会将其视为仍在解释HTML 的 <pre> 元素。

trans-unit.source: <script> elements, Worker importScripts
trans-unit.target: <script> 元素，工作程序 importScripts

trans-unit.source: <spacer> is an obsolete HTML element which allowed insertion of empty spaces on pages. It was devised by Netscape to accomplish the same effect as a single-pixel layout image, which was something web designers used to use to add white spaces to web pages without actually using an image. However, <spacer> no longer supported by any major browser and the same effects can now be achieved using simple CSS.
trans-unit.target: <spacer> 是一个过时的HTML元素，它允许在页面上插入空白。它是由Netscape设计的，以实现与单像素布局图像相同的效果，这是Web设计师习惯于在不实际使用图像的情况下向网页添加空白的功能。但是， <spacer> 不再受任何主流浏览器支持，并且现在可以使用简单的CSS实现相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: <textarea> is a replaced element — it has intrinsic dimensions, like a raster image. By default, its display value is block. Compared to other form elements it is relatively easy to style, with its box model, fonts, color scheme, etc. being easily manipulable using regular CSS.
trans-unit.target: <textarea> 是一个替换的元素 —它具有固有的尺寸，如光栅图像。默认情况下，其 display 值为block。与其他表单元素相比，它的样式相对容易，其框模型，字体，配色方案等可以使用常规CSS轻松操作。

trans-unit.source: 'no-referrer' means that the Referer header will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 'no-referrer' 意味着将不会发送 Referer 标头。

trans-unit.source: 'no-referrer' means the Referer: header will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: 'no-referrer' 表示 Referer: 标头将不会发送。

trans-unit.source: 'no-referrer-when-downgrade' means no Referer: header will be sent when navigating to an origin without HTTPS. This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 'no-referrer-when-downgrade' 表示没有 Referer: 在导航到不使用HTTPS的源时将不发送标头。这是默认行为。

trans-unit.source: 'no-referrer-when-downgrade' means that no Referer header will be sent when navigating to an origin without TLS (HTTPS). This is a user agent’s default behavior, if no policy is otherwise specified.
trans-unit.target: 'no-referrer-when-downgrade' 表示在导航到没有TLS（HTTPS）的原始地址时，不会发送 Referer 标头。如果未指定其他策略，这是用户代理的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: 'origin' means that the referrer will be the origin of the page, which is roughly the scheme, the host, and the port.
trans-unit.target: 'origin' 表示引荐来源网址将是页面的来源，大致是方案，主机和端口。

trans-unit.source: 'origin' means the referrer will be the origin of the page, not including information after the domain.
trans-unit.target: 'origin' 表示引荐来源网址将是页面的来源，不包括域之后的信息。

trans-unit.source: 'origin-when-cross-origin' meaning that navigations to other origins will be limited to the scheme, the host and the port, while navigations on the same origin will include the referrer's path.
trans-unit.target: 'origin-when-cross-origin' 意味着到其他来源的导航将仅限于方案，主机和端口，而在相同来源的导航将包括引荐来源网址的路径。

trans-unit.source: 'origin-when-cross-origin' means that navigating to other origins will be limited to the scheme, the host, and the port, while navigating on the same origin will include the referrer's path.
trans-unit.target: 'origin-when-cross-origin' 表示导航到其他起源将仅限于方案，主机和端口，而在同一起源上导航将包括引荐来源网址的路径。

trans-unit.source: 'unsafe-url' means that the referrer will include the origin and the path (but not the fragment, password, or username). This case is unsafe because it can leak origins and paths from TLS-protected resources to insecure origins.
trans-unit.target: 'unsafe-url' 表示引荐来源网址将包含来源和路径（但不包括片段，密码或用户名）。这种情况是不安全的，因为它可能会将来源和路径从受TLS保护的资源泄漏到不安全的来源。

trans-unit.source: 'unsafe-url' means the referrer will include the origin and path, but not the fragment, password, or username. This is unsafe because it can leak data from secure URLs to insecure ones.
trans-unit.target: 'unsafe-url' 表示引荐来源网址将包含来源和路径，但不包括片段，密码或用户名。这是不安全的，因为它会将数据从安全URL泄漏到不安全的URL。

trans-unit.source: button: A push button with no default behavior.
trans-unit.target: button ：没有默认行为的按钮。

trans-unit.source: checkbox: A check box allowing single values to be selected/deselected.
trans-unit.target: checkbox ：允许选择/取消选择单个值的复选框。

trans-unit.source: color: HTML5 A control for specifying a color. A color picker's UI has no required features other than accepting simple colors as text (more info).
trans-unit.target: color ： HTML5用于指定颜色的控件。颜色选择器的UI除了接受简单的颜色作为文本（更多信息）外，没有其他必需的功能。

trans-unit.source: date: HTML5 A control for entering a date (year, month, and day, with no time).
trans-unit.target: date ： HTML5用于输入日期（年，月和日，无时间）的控件。

trans-unit.source: datetime: HTML5 A control for entering a date and time (hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second) based on UTC time zone. This feature has been removed from WHATWG HTML.
trans-unit.target: datetime ： HTML5 一种控件，用于根据UTC时区输入日期和时间（时，分，秒和一秒的秒数）。此功能已从WHATWG HTML中删除。

trans-unit.source: datetime-local: HTML5 A control for entering a date and time, with no time zone.
trans-unit.target: datetime-local ： HTML5用于输入日期和时间（无时区）的控件。

trans-unit.source: email: HTML5 A field for editing an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: email ： HTML5用于编辑电子邮件地址的字段。

trans-unit.source: file: A control that lets the user select a file. Use the accept attribute to define the types of files that the control can select.
trans-unit.target: file ：允许用户选择文件的控件。使用 accept属性定义控件可以选择的文件类型。

trans-unit.source: hidden: A control that is not displayed but whose value is submitted to the server.
trans-unit.target: hidden ：不显示但其值已提交给服务器的控件。

trans-unit.source: image: A graphical submit button. You must use the src attribute to define the source of the image and the alt attribute to define alternative text. You can use the height and width attributes to define the size of the image in pixels.
trans-unit.target: image ：图形提交按钮。您必须使用 src属性来定义图像的来源，并使用 alt属性来定义替代文本。您可以使用 height和 width属性来定义图像的大小（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: month: HTML5 A control for entering a month and year, with no time zone.
trans-unit.target: month ： HTML5用于输入月份和年份（无时区）的控件。

trans-unit.source: number: HTML5 A control for entering a number.
trans-unit.target: number ： HTML5输入数字的控件。

trans-unit.source: password: A single-line text field whose value is obscured. Use the maxlength and minlength attributes to specify the maximum length of the value that can be entered.
trans-unit.target: password ：单行文本字段，其值被遮盖。使用 maxlength和 minlength属性可以指定可以输入的值的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: radio: A radio button, allowing a single value to be selected out of multiple choices.
trans-unit.target: radio ：单选按钮，允许从多个选项中选择一个值。

trans-unit.source: range: HTML5 A control for entering a number whose exact value is not important.
trans-unit.target: range ： HTML5用于输入其确切值不重要的数字的控件。

trans-unit.source: reset: A button that resets the contents of the form to default values.
trans-unit.target: reset ：将表单内容重置为默认值的按钮。

trans-unit.source: search: HTML5 A single-line text field for entering search strings. Line-breaks are automatically removed from the input value.
trans-unit.target: search ： HTML5用于输入搜索字符串的单行文本字段。换行符会自动从输入值中删除。

trans-unit.source: submit: A button that submits the form.
trans-unit.target: submit ：提交表单的按钮。

trans-unit.source: tel: HTML5 A control for entering a telephone number.
trans-unit.target: tel ： HTML5输入电话号码的控件。

trans-unit.source: text: A single-line text field. Line-breaks are automatically removed from the input value.
trans-unit.target: text ：单行文本字段。换行符会自动从输入值中删除。

trans-unit.source: time: HTML5 A control for entering a time value with no time zone.
trans-unit.target: time ： HTML5用于输入没有时区的时间值的控件。

trans-unit.source: url: HTML5 A field for entering a URL.
trans-unit.target: url ： HTML5用于输入URL的字段。

trans-unit.source: week: HTML5 A control for entering a date consisting of a week-year number and a week number with no time zone.
trans-unit.target: week ： HTML5用于输入日期的控件，该日期由周年号和无时区的周号组成。

trans-unit.source: theme-color: indicates a suggested color that user agents should use to customize the display of the page or of the surrounding user interface. The content attribute contains a valid CSS <color>.
trans-unit.target: theme-color ：表示用户代理用来自定义页面或周围用户界面显示的建议颜色。所述 content 属性包含一个有效的CSS <color> 。

trans-unit.source: _charset_ : If used as the name of an <input> element of type hidden, the input's value is automatically set by the user agent to the character encoding being used to submit the form.
trans-unit.target: _charset_ ：如果用作hidden类型的 <input> 元素的名称，则用户代理自动将输入的 value 设置为用于提交表单的字符编码。

trans-unit.source: _parent: Load into the parent browsing context of the current one. If no parent, behaves the same as _self.

trans-unit.source: _parent: Show the result in the parent browsing context of the current one, if the current page is inside a frame. If there is no parent, acts the same as _self.

trans-unit.source: _self (default): Load into the same browsing context as the current one.

trans-unit.source: _self: the current browsing context. (Default)
trans-unit.target: _self ：当前浏览上下文。（默认）

trans-unit.source: _top: HTML 4: Load the response into the full original window, and cancel all other frames. HTML5: Load the response into the top-level browsing context (i.e., the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one, and has no parent). If there is no parent, this option behaves the same way as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：HTML 4：将响应加载到完整的原始窗口中，然后取消所有其他框架。HTML5：将响应加载到顶级浏览上下文（即，当前上下文的祖先且没有父级的浏览上下文）中。如果没有父母，则此选项的行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: In HTML4: Load the response into the full, original window, canceling all other frames. In HTML5: Load the response into the top-level browsing context (that is, the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one, and has no parent). If there is no parent, this option behaves the same way as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：在HTML4中：将响应加载到完整的原始窗口中，取消所有其他框架。在HTML5中：将响应加载到顶级浏览上下文（即，当前上下文的祖先，并且没有父级的浏览上下文）中。如果没有父母，则此选项的行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Load into the top-level browsing context (i.e., the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one and has no parent). If no parent, behaves the same as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：加载到顶级浏览上下文（即，当前上下文的祖先且没有父级的浏览上下文）中。如果没有父母，则行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Load the URL into the top-level browsing context (that is, the "highest" browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one, and has no parent). If there is no parent, this behaves the same way as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：将URL加载到顶级浏览上下文中（即，“最高”浏览上下文是当前浏览上下文的祖先，并且没有父级）。如果没有父母，则其行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Load the response into the top-level browsing context (that is, the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one, and has no parent). If there is no parent, this option behaves the same as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：将响应加载到顶级浏览上下文（即，当前上下文的祖先且没有父级的浏览上下文）中。如果没有父母，则此选项的行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Load the response into the top-level browsing context (that is, the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one, and has no parent). If there is no parent, this option behaves the same way as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：将响应加载到顶级浏览上下文（即，当前上下文的祖先且没有父级的浏览上下文）中。如果没有父母，则此选项的行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Load the result into the top-level browsing context (that is, the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one, and has no parent). If there is no parent, this option behaves the same way as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：将结果加载到顶级浏览上下文（即，当前上下文的祖先且没有父级的浏览上下文）中。如果没有父母，则此选项的行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Show the resource in the topmost browsing context (the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one and has no parent). If there is no parent, acts the same as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：在最顶部的浏览上下文中显示资源（该浏览上下文是当前资源的祖先，并且没有父级）。如果没有父母，则行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: Show the result in the topmost browsing context (the browsing context that is an ancestor of the current one and has no parent). If there is no parent, acts the same as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：在最顶部的浏览上下文中显示结果（该浏览上下文是当前浏览上下文的祖先，并且没有父级）。如果没有父母，则行为与 _self 相同。

trans-unit.source: _top: the topmost browsing context (the "highest" context that’s an ancestor of the current one). If no ancestors, behaves as _self.
trans-unit.target: _top ：最高浏览上下文（“最高”上下文是当前上下文的祖先）。如果没有祖先，则表现为 _self 。

trans-unit.target: accept="image/*" -接受任何具有 image/* MIME类型的文件。（使用时，许多移动设备还允许用户使用相机拍照。）

trans-unit.source: accesskey is only supported on <a>, <area>, <button>, <input>, <label>, <legend> and <textarea>.
trans-unit.target: accesskey 仅在 <a> ， <area> ， <button> ， <input> ， <label> ， <legend> 和 <textarea> 上支持accesskey。

trans-unit.source: accesskey values that rely on numbers may be confusing to individuals experiencing cognitive concerns, where the number doesn't have a logical association with the functionality it triggers.
trans-unit.target: accesskey 依赖数字的accesskey值可能会使遇到认知问题的人感到困惑，因为数字与其触发的功能没有逻辑关联。

trans-unit.source: accesskey values that rely on numbers may be confusing to individuals experiencing cognitive concerns, where they number does not have a logical association with the functionality it triggers.
trans-unit.target: accesskey 依赖数字的访问密钥值可能会使遇到认知问题的人感到困惑，因为他们的数字与其触发的功能没有逻辑关联。

trans-unit.source: accesskeyHTML 4 only, Obsolete since Gecko 5.0
trans-unit.target: accesskey 仅HTML 4，自Gecko 5.0起已作废

trans-unit.source: address-level1 always represents the broadest administrative division; it is the least-specific portion of the address short of the country name.
trans-unit.target: address-level1 始终代表最广泛的行政区划；它是地址中最不明确的部分，缺少国家/地区名称。

trans-unit.source: address-level1 is used for prefectures or the Tokyo Metropolis; "長野県" (Nagano Prefecture) is in this case. address-level2 is typically used for cities, counties, towns and villages; "長野市" (Nagano City) in this case. "某町123" is address-line1 which consists of an area name and a lot number.
trans-unit.target: address-level1 用于县或东京都；在这种情况下为“长野県”（长野县）。 address-level2 通常用于城市，县，镇和村庄；在这种情况下为“长野市”（长野市）。“某町123”是 address-line1 ，由区域名称和批号组成。

trans-unit.source: address-level1: The post town — "Winchelsea" in this case.
trans-unit.target: address-level1 ：邮政城镇-在这种情况下为“ Winchelsea”。

trans-unit.source: address-line1: The house/street particulars — "103 Frogmarch Street"
trans-unit.target: address-line1 ：房屋/街道详情-“ 103 Frogmarch Street”

trans-unit.source: address-line2: The locality — "Upper-Wapping" in this case.
trans-unit.target: address-line2 ：位置-在这种情况下为“上限”。

trans-unit.source: all, which will cause the rules to be displayed between rows and columns.
trans-unit.target: all ，这将导致规则显示在行和列之间。

trans-unit.source: allow-downloads-without-user-activation : Allows for downloads to occur without a gesture from the user.
trans-unit.target: allow-downloads-without-user-activation ：允许下载而无需用户打手势。

trans-unit.source: allow-downloads: Allows for downloads to occur with a gesture from the user.
trans-unit.target: allow-downloads ：允许通过用户的手势进行下载。

trans-unit.source: allow-forms: Allows the embedded browsing context to submit forms. If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow-forms ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文提交表单。如果不使用此关键字，则不允许执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: allow-forms: Allows the resource to submit forms. If this keyword is not used, form submission is blocked.
trans-unit.target: allow-forms ：允许资源提交表单。如果不使用此关键字，则阻止表单提交。

trans-unit.source: allow-modals: Allows the embedded browsing context to open modal windows.
trans-unit.target: allow-modals ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文打开模式窗口。

trans-unit.source: allow-modals: Lets the resource open modal windows.
trans-unit.target: allow-modals ：允许资源打开模式窗口。

trans-unit.source: allow-orientation-lock: Allows the embedded browsing context to disable the ability to lock the screen orientation.
trans-unit.target: allow-orientation-lock ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文禁用锁定屏幕方向的功能。

trans-unit.source: allow-orientation-lock: Lets the resource lock the screen orientation.
trans-unit.target: allow-orientation-lock ：让资源锁定屏幕方向。

trans-unit.source: allow-pointer-lock: Allows the embedded browsing context to use the Pointer Lock API.
trans-unit.target: allow-pointer-lock ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文使用Pointer Lock API。

trans-unit.source: allow-pointer-lock: Lets the resource use the Pointer Lock API.
trans-unit.target: allow-pointer-lock ：允许资源使用Pointer Lock API。

trans-unit.source: allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox: Allows a sandboxed document to open new windows without forcing the sandboxing flags upon them. This will allow, for example, a third-party advertisement to be safely sandboxed without forcing the same restrictions upon a landing page.
trans-unit.target: allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox ：允许沙盒文档打开新窗口，而无需在其上强加沙盒标志。例如，这将允许第三方广告被安全地沙盒化，而不必在目标网页上施加相同的限制。

trans-unit.source: allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox: Lets the sandboxed document open new windows without those windows inheriting the sandboxing. For example, this can safely sandbox an advertisement without forcing the same restrictions upon the page the ad links to.
trans-unit.target: allow-popups-to-escape-sandbox ：让沙盒文档打开新窗口，而这些窗口不会继承沙盒。例如，这可以安全地将广告沙箱化，而不必对广告链接到的页面施加相同的限制。

trans-unit.source: allow-popups: Allows popups (like from window.open, target="_blank", showModalDialog). If this keyword is not used, that functionality will silently fail.
trans-unit.target: allow-popups ：允许弹出窗口（如 window.open ， target="_blank" ， showModalDialog ）。如果不使用此关键字，则该功能将静默失败。

trans-unit.source: allow-popups: Allows popups (such as window.open(), target="_blank", or showModalDialog()). If this keyword is not used, the popup will silently fail to open.
trans-unit.target: allow-popups ：允许弹出窗口（例如 window.open() ， target="_blank" 或 showModalDialog() ）。如果不使用此关键字，则弹出窗口将以静默方式无法打开。

trans-unit.source: allow-presentation: Allows embedders to have control over whether an iframe can start a presentation session.
trans-unit.target: allow-presentation ：允许嵌入者控制iframe是否可以启动演示会话。

trans-unit.source: allow-presentation: Lets the resource start a presentation session.
trans-unit.target: allow-presentation ：让资源开始演示会话。

trans-unit.source: allow-same-origin: Allows the content to be treated as being from its normal origin. If this keyword is not used, the embedded content is treated as being from a unique origin.
trans-unit.target: allow-same-origin ：允许将内容视为来自其正常来源。如果不使用此关键字，则将嵌入内容视为来自唯一来源。

trans-unit.source: allow-same-origin: If this token is not used, the resource is treated as being from a special origin that always fails the same-origin policy.
trans-unit.target: allow-same-origin ：如果不使用此令牌，则资源被视为来自始终源自同源策略的特殊来源。

trans-unit.source: allow-scripts: Allows the embedded browsing context to run scripts (but not create pop-up windows). If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow-scripts ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文运行脚本（但不能创建弹出窗口）。如果不使用此关键字，则不允许执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: allow-scripts: Lets the resource run scripts (but not create popup windows).
trans-unit.target: allow-scripts ：让资源运行脚本（但不创建弹出窗口）。

trans-unit.source: allow-storage-access-by-user-activation : Allows the embedded browsing context to request access to the embedding document's storage capabilities (e.g. cookies, Web Storage) via the Storage Access API.
trans-unit.target: allow-storage-access-by-user-activation ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文通过Storage Access API请求访问嵌入文档的存储功能（例如cookie，Web Storage）。

trans-unit.source: allow-storage-access-by-user-activation : Lets the resource request access to the parent's storage capabilities with the Storage Access API.
trans-unit.target: allow-storage-access-by-user-activation ：允许资源使用Storage Access API请求访问父级的存储功能。

trans-unit.source: allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation: Allows the embedded browsing context to navigate (load) content to the top-level browsing context only when initiated by a user gesture. If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation ：仅当由用户手势启动时，才允许嵌入式浏览上下文将内容导航（加载）到顶级浏览上下文。如果不使用此关键字，则不允许执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation: Lets the resource navigate the top-level browsing context, but only if initiated by a user gesture.
trans-unit.target: allow-top-navigation-by-user-activation ：让资源浏览顶级浏览上下文，但仅在由用户手势启动的情况下。

trans-unit.source: allow-top-navigation: Allows the embedded browsing context to navigate (load) content to the top-level browsing context. If this keyword is not used, this operation is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow-top-navigation ：允许嵌入式浏览上下文将内容导航（加载）到顶级浏览上下文。如果不使用此关键字，则不允许执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: allow-top-navigation: Lets the resource navigate the top-level browsing context (the one named _top).
trans-unit.target: allow-top-navigation ：让资源浏览顶级浏览上下文（一个名为 _top 的浏览上下文）。

trans-unit.source: id is supported on all elements but <base>, <head>, <html>, <meta>, <script>, <style>, and <title>.

trans-unit.source: id's value must not contain whitespace (spaces, tabs etc.). Browsers treat non-conforming IDs that contain whitespace as if the whitespace is part of the ID. In contrast to the class attribute, which allows space-separated values, elements can only have one single ID value.
trans-unit.target: id 的值不能包含空格（空格，制表符等）。浏览器将包含空格的不合格ID视为空白，是该ID的一部分。与允许使用空格分隔值的 class 属性相反，元素只能具有一个单个ID值。

trans-unit.source: imageReceived() is called to handle the "load" event on the HTMLImageElement that receives the downloaded image. This event is triggered once the downloaded data is all available. It begins by creating a new <canvas> element that we'll use to convert the image into a data URL, and by getting access to the canvas's 2D drawing context (CanvasRenderingContext2D) in the variable context.
trans-unit.target: imageReceived() 来处理接收下载图像的 HTMLImageElement 上的 "load" 事件。一旦下载的数据全部可用，就会触发此事件。首先，创建一个新的 <canvas> 元素，将其用于将图像转换为数据URL，并在变量 context 中访问画布的2D绘图上下文（ CanvasRenderingContext2D ）。

trans-unit.source: itemscope (usually) works along with itemtype to specify that the HTML contained in a block is about a particular item. itemscope creates the Item and defines the scope of the itemtype associated with it. itemtype is a valid URL of a vocabulary (such as schema.org) that describes the item and its properties context.
trans-unit.target: itemscope （通常）与 itemtype 一起使用，以指定块中包含的HTML与特定项目有关。 itemscope 创建Item并定义与其关联的 itemtype 的范围。 itemtype 是描述项目及其属性上下文的词汇表（例如schema.org）的有效URL 。

trans-unit.source: itemscope id attributes
trans-unit.target: itemscope ID属性

trans-unit.source: itemscope is a boolean global attribute that defines the scope of associated metadata. Specifying the itemscope attribute for an element creates a new item, which results in a number of name-value pairs that are associated with the element. A related attribute, itemtype, is used to specify the valid URL of a vocabulary (such as schema.org) that describes the item and its properties context. In each of the following examples, the vocabulary is from schema.org.
trans-unit.target: itemscope 是一个布尔全局属性，它定义关联的元数据的范围。为元素指定 itemscope 属性将创建一个新项目，这将导致与该元素相关联的多个名称/值对。相关属性 itemtype 用于指定描述项目及其属性上下文的词汇表（例如schema.org）的有效URL 。在以下每个示例中，词汇表来自schema.org。

trans-unit.source: lazy: Defers loading the image until it reaches a calculated distance from the viewport, as defined by the browser. The intent is to avoid the network and storage bandwidth needed to handle the image until it's reasonably certain that it will be needed. This generally improves the performance of the content in most typical use cases.
trans-unit.target: lazy ：延迟加载图像，直到图像达到浏览器定义的距视口的距离为止。目的是避免处理图像所需的网络和存储带宽，直到可以合理确定将需要它为止。通常，这可以提高大多数典型用例中内容的性能。

trans-unit.source: maxlength specifies a maximum number of characters that the <textarea> is allowed to contain. You can also set a minimum length that is considered valid using the minlength attribute, and specify that the <textarea> will not submit (and is invalid) if it is empty, using the required attribute. This provides the <textarea> with simple validation, which is more basic than the other form elements (for example, you can't provide specific regexs to validate the value against using the pattern attribute, like you can with the <input> element).
trans-unit.target: maxlength 指定允许 <textarea> 包含的最大字符数。您还可以使用 minlength 属性设置被视为有效的最小长度，并使用 required 属性指定 <textarea> 如果为空，则不会提交（并且无效）。这为 <textarea> 提供了简单的验证，它比其他表单元素更基本（例如，您不能提供特定的正则表达式来使用 pattern 属性来验证值，就像您可以使用 <input> 元素一样） 。

trans-unit.source: module Causes the code to be treated as a JavaScript module. The processing of the script contents is not affected by the charset and defer attributes. For information on using module, see our JavaScript modules guide. Unlike classic scripts, module scripts require the use of the CORS protocol for cross-origin fetching.
trans-unit.target: module 使代码被视为JavaScript模块。脚本内容的处理不受 charset 和 defer 属性的影响。有关使用 module 信息，请参见我们的JavaScript模块指南。与经典脚本不同，模块脚本要求使用CORS协议进行跨域获取。

trans-unit.source: module For HTML5-compliant browsers the code is treated as a JavaScript module. The processing of the script contents is not affected by the charset and defer attributes. For information on using module, see ES6 in Depth: Modules. Code may behave differently when the module keyword is used.
trans-unit.target: module 对于兼容HTML5的浏览器，该代码被视为JavaScript模块。脚本内容的处理不受 charset 和 defer 属性的影响。有关使用 module 信息，请参阅《深度：模块》中的ES6。使用 module 关键字时，代码的行为可能有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Figure 1. An HSL color cylinder. Hue defines the actual color based on the position along a circular color wheel representing the colors of the visible spectrum. Saturation is a percentage of how much of the way between being a shade of gray and having the maximum possible amount of the given hue. As the value of luminance (or lightness) increases, the color transitions from the darkest possible to the brightest possible (from black to white). Image courtesy of user SharkD on Wikipedia, distributed under the CC BY-SA 3.0 license.
trans-unit.target: 图1. HSL彩色滚筒。色相基于代表可见光谱颜色的圆形色轮上的位置定义实际颜色。饱和度是介于灰色阴影和给定色调的最大可能数量之间的方式的百分比。随着亮度（或亮度）值的增加，颜色从可能的最暗过渡到可能的最亮（从黑色到白色）。用户提供图片SharkD在维基百科中，下分布式CC BY-SA 3.0许可。

trans-unit.source: Context menus consist of a <menu> element which contains <menuitem> elements for each selectable option in the menu, <menu> elements for submenus within the menu, and <hr> elements for separator lines to break up the menu's content into sections. Context menus are then attached to the element they're activated from using either the associated element's contextmenu attribute or, for button-activated menus attached to <button> elements, the menu attribute.
trans-unit.target: 上下文菜单由一个 <menu> 元素组成，该元素包含 <menuitem> 中每个可选选项的 <menuitem>元素，菜单内子菜单的 <menu> 元素以及分隔线的 <hr> 元素，用于将菜单的内容分成多个部分。然后，将上下文菜单附加到通过使用关联元素的 contextmenu 属性激活的元素上，或者对于附加到 <button> 元素的按钮激活菜单，使用 menu 属性。

trans-unit.source: Toolbar menus consist of a <menu> element whose content is described in one of two ways: either as an unordered list of items represented by <li> elements (each representing a command or option the user can utilize), or (if there are no <li> elements), flow content describing the available commands and options.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏菜单由 <menu> 元素组成，其内容用以下两种方式之一进行描述：作为由 <li> 元素表示的项目的无序列表（每个代表用户可以使用的命令或选项），或没有 <li> 元素），流内容描述了可用的命令和选项。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility note: If you wish to use the appearance property, you should test it very carefully. Although it is supported in most modern browsers, its implementation varies widely. In older browsers, even the keyword none does not have the same effect across different browsers, and some do not support it at all. The differences are smaller in the newest browsers.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性说明：如果要使用 appearance 属性，则应非常仔细地进行测试。尽管大多数现代浏览器都支持它，但是其实现方式却相差很大。在较旧的浏览器中，即使关键字 none 在不同的浏览器中也不会具有相同的效果，并且有些根本不支持它。在最新的浏览器中，差异较小。

trans-unit.source: Important: While the value isn't displayed to the user in the page's content, it is visible—and can be edited—using any browser's developer tools or "View Source" functionality. Do not rely on hidden inputs as a form of security.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：虽然该值不会在页面内容中显示给用户，但可以使用任何浏览器的开发人员工具或“查看源代码”功能来查看并进行编辑。不要依赖 hidden 输入作为安全形式。

trans-unit.source: Important: Client-side form validation is no substitute for validating on the server. It's easy for someone to modify the HTML, or bypass your HTML entirely and submit the data directly to your server. If your server fails to validate the received data, disaster could strike with data that is badly-formatted, too large, of the wrong type, etc.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：客户端表单验证不能替代服务器上的验证。有人修改HTML或完全绕过HTML并将数据直接提交到服务器很容易。如果您的服务器无法验证收到的数据，则格式错误，过大，类型错误的数据等可能会造成灾难。

trans-unit.source: Important: HTML form validation is not a substitute for scripts that ensure that the entered data is in the proper format. It's far too easy for someone to make adjustments to the HTML that allow them to bypass the validation, or to remove it completely. It's also possible for someone to simply bypass your HTML entirely and submit the data directly to your server. If your server-side code fails to validate the data it receives, disaster could strike when improperly-formatted data (or data which is too large, is of the wrong type, and so forth) is entered into your database.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：HTML表单验证是不为脚本，确保输入的数据是正确的格式的替代品。对于某人来说，对HTML进行调整以使其绕过验证或完全删除验证太容易了。有人也可以完全绕开您的HTML并将数据直接提交到您的服务器。如果服务器端代码无法验证接收到的数据，则当将格式不正确的数据（或太大，类型错误的数据等等）输入数据库时​​，灾难可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: Important: HTML form validation is not a substitute for server-side scripts that ensure that the entered data is in the proper format. It's far too easy for someone to make adjustments to the HTML that allow them to bypass the validation, or to remove it entirely. It's also possible for someone to bypass your HTML and submit the data directly to your server. If your server-side code fails to validate the data it receives, disaster could strike when improperly-formatted data is submitted (or data which is too large, is of the wrong type, and so forth).
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：HTML表单验证是不是用于服务器端脚本，确保输入的数据是正确的格式的替代品。对于某人来说，对HTML进行调整以使其绕过验证或完全删除验证太容易了。有人也有可能绕过您的HTML并将数据直接提交到您的服务器。如果您的服务器端代码无法验证其接收的数据，则在提交格式不正确的数据（或数据太大，类型错误的数据，等等）时，灾难可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: Important: HTML form validation is not a substitute for server-side scripts that ensure the entered data is in the proper format before it is allowed into the database. It's far too easy for someone to make adjustments to the HTML that allow them to bypass the validation, or to remove it entirely. It's also possible for someone to simply bypass your HTML entirely and submit the data directly to your server. If your server-side code fails to validate the data it receives, disaster could strike when improperly-formatted data (or data which is too large, is of the wrong type, and so forth) is entered into your database.
trans-unit.target: 重要提示：HTML表单验证是不是用于服务器端脚本，以确保输入的数据是正确的格式也被允许进入数据库之前的替代品。对于某人而言，对HTML进行调整以使其绕过验证或将其完全删除是非常容易的。有人也可以完全绕开您的HTML并将数据直接提交到您的服务器。如果服务器端代码无法验证接收到的数据，则当将格式不正确的数据（或太大，类型错误的数据等等）输入数据库时​​，灾难可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you set autocomplete to off in a form because the document provides its own auto-completion, then you should also set autocomplete to off for each of the form's input elements that the document can auto-complete. For details, see the note regarding Google Chrome in the Browser Compatibility chart.
trans-unit.target: 注：如果您设置 autocomplete ，以 off 的形式，因为该文件提供了自己的自动完成，那么你也应该设置 autocomplete ，以 off 每个表单的 input 元素，该文件可以自动完成。有关详细信息，请参阅浏览器兼容性图表中有关Google Chrome的注释。

trans-unit.source: Note: Most icon formats are only able to store one single icon; therefore most of the time the sizes attribute contains only one entry. MS's ICO format does, as well as Apple's ICNS. ICO is more ubiquitous, so you should use this format if cross-browser support is a concern (especially for old IE versions).
trans-unit.target: 注意：大多数图标格式只能存储一个图标。因此，在大多数情况下， sizes 属性仅包含一个条目。MS的ICO格式和Apple的ICNS一样。ICO更为普遍，因此，如果需要跨浏览器支持，则应该使用此格式（尤其是对于旧的IE版本）。

trans-unit.source: Note: Most icon formats are only able to store one single icon; therefore most of the time the sizes contains only one entry. MS's ICO format does, as well as Apple's ICNS. ICO is more ubiquitous; you should definitely use it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：大多数图标格式只能存储一个图标。因此，大多数情况下， sizes 仅包含一个条目。MS的ICO格式和Apple的ICNS一样。ICO更普遍。您一定要使用它。

trans-unit.source: Note: On Apache servers, the MIME type for manifest (.appcache) files can be set by adding AddType text/cache-manifest .appcache to a .htaccess file within either the root directory, or the same directory as the application.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Apache服务器上，可以通过将 AddType text/cache-manifest .appcache 添加到根目录或与应用程序相同的目录中的.htaccess文件中来设置清单（.appcache）文件的MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: Note: Relative URIs are relative to the cache manifest's URI, not to the URI of the document referencing the manifest.
trans-unit.target: 注意：相对URI是相对于缓存清单的URI，而不是引用清单的文档的URI。

trans-unit.source: Note: Since HTML5, omitting the href attribute is sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从HTML5开始，省略 href 属性就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Note: The importance attribute may only be used for the <link> element if rel="preload" or rel="prefetch" is present.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当存在 rel="preload" 或 rel="prefetch" ， importance 属性才可用于 <link> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: The item* attributes are part of the WHATWG HTML Microdata feature.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 item* 属性是的一部分WHATWG HTML微观数据的功能。

trans-unit.source: Note: The equivalent text-align property for the align="char" is not implemented in any browsers yet. See the text-align's browser compatibility section for the <string> value.
trans-unit.target: 注意： align="char" 的等效 text-align 属性尚未在任何浏览器中实现。见 text-align 的浏览器兼容性部为 <string> 值。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is applied on the attributes of the column group, it has no effect on the CSS styling rules associated with it or, even more, to the cells of the column's members of the group.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性应用于列组的属性，它对与其关联的CSS样式规则没有影响，甚至对列组中成员的单元格没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though present in early draft of the specifications and implemented in several browsers, this element has been removed in later versions of the spec, and should not be used. It is documented here to assist in adapting code written during the time it was included in the spec to work with newer versions of the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管在规范的早期草案中存在并且已在多个浏览器中实现，但是此元素在规范的更高版本中已被删除，因此不应使用。此处记录了该文档，以帮助适应在规范中包含的这段时间内编写的代码，以使其与规范的新版本一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unless the value attribute is between 0 and 1 (inclusive), the min and max attributes should define the range so that the value attribute's value is within it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：除非 value 属性在 0 到 1 （含）之间，否则 min 和 max 属性应定义范围，以便 value 属性的值在其范围内。

trans-unit.source: Note: While there is no disabled attribute in the HTML standard, there is a disabled attribute on the HTMLLinkElement DOM object.
trans-unit.target: 注：虽然没有 disabled 的HTML标准的属性，有是一个 disabled 的上属性 HTMLLinkElement DOM对象。

trans-unit.source: Note: You cannot use this attribute if the <img> element is a descendant of an <a> or <button> element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 <img> 元素是 <a> 或 <button> 元素的后代，则不能使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: You cannot use this attribute if the <img> element is inside an <a> or <button> element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 <img> 元素在 <a> 或 <button> 元素内，则不能使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: as of this writing, there are bugs in Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome which prevent flexbox and grid layouts from being used inside a <fieldset>. This GitHub issue provides bug tracking links.
trans-unit.target: 注意：撰写本文时，Microsoft Edge和Google Chrome中存在一些错误，这些错误会阻止在 <fieldset> 中使用flexbox和网格布局。该GitHub问题提供了错误跟踪链接。

trans-unit.source: Note: in Firefox you could specify the version of JavaScript contained in a <script> element by including a non-standard version parameter inside the type attribute — for example type="text/javascript;version=1.8". This has been removed in Firefox 59 (see bug 1428745).
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Firefox中，您可以通过在 type 属性中包含非标准 version 参数来指定 <script> 元素中包含的JavaScript 版本，例如 type="text/javascript;version=1.8" 。Firefox 59已将其删除（请参见bug 1428745）。

trans-unit.source: Note: the itemref attribute is not part of the microdata data model. It is merely a syntactic construct to aid authors in adding annotations to pages where the data to be annotated does not follow a convenient tree structure. For example, it allows authors to mark up data in a table so that each column defines a separate item while keeping the properties in the cells.
trans-unit.target: 注：在 itemref 属性不是微观数据模型的一部分。它只是一种语法结构，可以帮助作者在页面上添加注释，在这些页面中，要注释的数据不遵循便利的树形结构。例如，它允许作者在表中标记数据，以便每一列定义一个单独的项目，同时将属性保留在单元格中。

trans-unit.target: Note:

trans-unit.source: Note: According to the HTML5 specification, the default value for size should be 1; however, in practice, this has been found to break some web sites, and no other browser currently does that, so Mozilla has opted to continue to return 0 for the time being with Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 注意：根据HTML5规范，大小的默认值应为1；默认值为1。但是，在实践中，发现它破坏了某些网站，并且当前没有其他浏览器这样做，因此Mozilla选择暂时将Firefox返回0。

trans-unit.source: Note: According to the HTML5 specification, the default value for size should be 1; however, in practice, this has been found to break some web sites, and no other browser currently does that, so Mozilla has opted to continue to return 0 for the time being with Firefox.
trans-unit.target: 注意：根据HTML5规范，size的默认值应为 1 ；默认值为1。但是，在实践中，这发现会破坏某些网站，并且当前没有其他浏览器能够做到这一点，因此Mozilla选择暂时将Firefox继续返回 0 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Also bear in mind that if such data is submitted via HTTP GET, the colon character will need to be escaped for inclusion in the URL parameters, e.g. partydate=2017-06-01T08%3A30. See encodeURI() for one way to do this.
trans-unit.target: 注意：还请记住，如果此类数据是通过HTTP GET 提交的，则需要转义冒号字符以将其包含在URL参数中，例如 partydate=2017-06-01T08%3A30 。请参阅 encodeURI() 以了解执行此操作的一种方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: Although browsers and email clients may still support this attribute, it is obsolete. Use CSS background-image instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管浏览器和电子邮件客户端可能仍然支持此属性，但是它已过时。请改用CSS background-image 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Although not required by the specification, Firefox will by default persist the dynamic disabled state of an <input> across page loads. Use the autocomplete attribute to control this feature.
trans-unit.target: 注：虽然不是规范要求的，Firefox将默认坚持动态禁用状态的的 <input> 整个页面加载。使用 autocomplete 属性控制此功能。

trans-unit.source: Note: Although recognized, the singular archive is incorrect and must be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管可以识别，但单个 archive 是不正确的，必须避免。

trans-unit.source: Note: Always validate input constraints both client side and server side. Constraint validation doesn't remove the need for validation on the server side. Invalid values can still be sent by older browsers or by bad actors.
trans-unit.target: 注意：始终在客户端和服务器端都验证输入约束。约束验证并不能消除服务器端验证的需要。无效的值仍然可以由较旧的浏览器或不良行为者发送。

trans-unit.source: Note: An element with the autofocus attribute may gain focus before the DOMContentLoaded event is fired.

trans-unit.source: Note: An input can only be associated with one form.
trans-unit.target: 注意：输入只能与一种形式相关联。

trans-unit.source: Note: Any forms involving sensitive information like passwords (e.g. login forms) should be served over HTTPS; Many browsers now implement mechanisms to warn against insecure login forms; see Insecure passwords.

trans-unit.source: Note: Apple's iOS does not use this link type, nor the sizes attribute, like others mobile browsers do, to select a webpage icon for Web Clip or a start-up placeholder. Instead, it uses the non-standard apple-touch-icon and apple-touch-startup-image respectively.

trans-unit.source: Note: Avoid using the placeholder attribute if you can. It is not as semantically useful as other ways to explain your form, and can cause unexpected technical issues with your content. See Labels and placeholders in <input>: The Input (Form Input) element for more information.

trans-unit.source: Note: Browsers do not always display the image referenced by the element. This is the case for non-graphical browsers (including those used by people with visual impairments), if the user chooses not to display images, or if the browser cannot display the image because it is invalid or an unsupported type. In these cases, the browser may replace the image with the text defined in this element's alt attribute. You should, for these reasons and others, provide a useful value for alt whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: 注意：浏览器并不总是显示该元素引用的图像。如果用户选择不显示图像，或者浏览器由于无效或不支持的类型而无法显示图像，则非图形浏览器（包括那些有视觉障碍的人使用的浏览器）就是这种情况。在这些情况下，浏览器可以用此元素的 alt 属性中定义的文本替换图像。由于这些原因和其他原因，您应尽可能提供 alt 的有用值。

trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿使用此属性，因为在最新标准中该属性已过时（且不受支持）。为了获得与 char 相同的效果，在CSS3中，可以将使用 char 属性的字符集用作 text-align 属性Unimplemented的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: In most modern browsers, setting autocomplete to "off" will not prevent a password manager from asking the user if they would like to save username and password information, or from automatically filling in those values in a site's login form. trans-unit.source: Note: In most modern browsers, setting autocomplete to "off" will not prevent a password manager from asking the user if they would like to save username and password information, or from automatically filling in those values in a site's login form. trans-unit.source: Note: In newer browser versions (e.g. Firefox 79+) setting target="_blank" on <a> elements implicitly provides the same rel behavior as setting rel="noopener".
trans-unit.target: 注意：在较新的浏览器版本（例如Firefox 79+）中，在 <a> 元素上设置 target="_blank" 隐式提供了与设置 rel="noopener" 相同的 rel 行为。

trans-unit.source: Note: In newer browser versions (e.g. Firefox 79+) setting target="_blank" on <area> elements implicitly provides the same rel behavior as setting rel="noopener".

trans-unit.source: Note: In some instances, such as <div>, this is a legacy attribute, in which case the CSS height property should be used instead.

trans-unit.source: Note: Linking to another page using target="_blank" will run the new page on the same process as your page. If the new page is executing expensive JS, your page's performance may suffer. To avoid this use rel=noopener.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 target="_blank" 链接到另一个页面将以与页面相同的过程运行新页面。如果新页面正在执行昂贵的JS，则页面的性能可能会受到影响。为了避免这种情况，请使用 rel=noopener 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Loading is only deferred when JavaScript is enabled. This is an anti-tracking measure, because if a user agent supported lazy loading when scripting is disabled, it would still be possible for a site to track a user's approximate scroll position throughout a session, by strategically placing images in a page's markup such that a server can track how many images are requested and when.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当启用JavaScript时才推迟加载。这是一种反跟踪措施，因为如果在禁用脚本时用户代理支持延迟加载，则站点仍可以通过策略性地将图像放置在页面标记中来跟踪整个会话中用户的大概滚动位置，服务器可以跟踪请求的图像数量和时间。

trans-unit.source: Note: Normally, if you specify the required attribute, the user must enter a valid e-mail address for the field to be considered valid. However, if you add the multiple attribute, a list of zero e-mail addresses (an empty string, or one which is entirely whitespace) is a valid value. In other words, the user does not have to enter even one e-mail address when multiple is specified, regardless of the value of required.
trans-unit.target: 注意：通常，如果您指定 required 属性，则用户必须输入有效的电子邮件地址，该字段才被视为有效。但是，如果您添加了 multiple 属性，则零电子邮件地址列表（一个空字符串或一个完全为空格的列表）是有效值。换句话说，如果指定了 multiple ，则用户无需输入甚至一个电子邮件地址，而无需指定 required 的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Omitting this attribute altogether indicates that the image is a key part of the content, and no textual equivalent is available. Setting this attribute to an empty string (alt="") indicates that this image is not a key part of the content (decorative), and that non-visual browsers may omit it from rendering.
trans-unit.target: 注意：完全省略此属性表示图像是内容的关键部分，并且没有等效的文本可用。将此属性设置为空字符串（ alt="" ）表示此图像不是内容的关键部分（装饰性的），并且非可视浏览器可能会忽略它以进行渲染。

trans-unit.source: Note: Only text controls can be made read-only, since for other controls (such as checkboxes and buttons) there is no useful distinction between being read-only and being disabled, so the readonly attribute does not apply.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅文本控件可以设为只读，因为对于其他控件（例如复选框和按钮），在 readonly 和禁用之间没有有用的区别，因此readonly属性不适用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The align attribute on <p> tags is obsolete and shouldn't be used.
trans-unit.target: 注意： <p> 标记上的 align 属性已过时，不应使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: The autocomplete attribute also controls whether Firefox will — unlike other browsers — persist the dynamic disabled state and (if applicable) dynamic checkedness of an <input> across page loads. The persistence feature is enabled by default. Setting the value of the autocomplete attribute to off disables this feature. This works even when the autocomplete attribute would normally not apply to the <input> by virtue of its type. See bug 654072.
trans-unit.target: 注：在 autocomplete 属性还控制是否Firefox会-不像其他的浏览器- 坚持动态禁用状态及（如适用）动态checkedness一中 <input> 整个页面加载。持久性功能默认情况下处于启用状态。将 autocomplete 属性的值设置为 off 将禁用此功能。即使 autocomplete 属性由于其 type 通常不适用于 <input> ，此方法也可以使用。参见错误654072。

trans-unit.source: Note: The autocomplete attribute also controls whether Firefox will — unlike other browsers — persist the dynamic disabled state and (if applicable) dynamic checkedness of an <input> element, <textarea> element, or entire <form> across page loads. The persistence feature is enabled by default. Setting the value of the autocomplete attribute to off disables this feature. This works even when the autocomplete attribute would normally not apply by virtue of its type. See bug 654072.
trans-unit.target: 注意：所述的 autocomplete 属性还控制是否Firefox将-不像其他浏览器-持续动态禁用状态和（如果适用）动态checkedness一个的 <input> 元素， <textarea> 的元素，或整个 <form> 跨页的负荷。持久性功能默认情况下处于启用状态。将 autocomplete 属性的值设置为 off 将禁用此功能。即使 autocomplete 属性由于其 type 通常不适用时，此方法也可以使用。参见错误654072。

trans-unit.source: Note: The load event fires once the stylesheet and all of its imported content has been loaded and parsed, and immediately before the styles start being applied to the content.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 load 事件触发一次样式表和它的所有导入的内容已经被加载和分析，以及风格开始被应用到内容之前。

trans-unit.source: Note: The placeholder attribute is not as semantically useful as other ways to explain your form, and can cause unexpected technical issues with your content. See Labels in <input>: The Input (Form Input) element for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 placeholder 属性不为语义有用，因为其他的方式来解释你的形式，并可以与您的内容会导致意外的技术问题。看到标签在<输入>：输入（表格输入）元件获得更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: The required attribute is not permitted on inputs with the disabled attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在指定了 disabled 属性的输入中，不允许使用 required 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The required attribute is not permitted on inputs with the readonly attribute specified.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在指定了 readonly 属性的输入上不允许使用 required 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The spellcheck attribute is an enumerated one and not a Boolean one. This means that the explicit usage of one of the values true or false is mandatory, and that a shorthand like <textarea spellcheck></textarea> is not allowed. The correct usage is <textarea spellcheck="true"></textarea>.
trans-unit.target: 注：该 spellcheck 属性是一个枚举一个，而不是一个布尔之一。这意味着必须明确使用值 true 或 false 之一，并且不允许使用诸如 <textarea spellcheck></textarea> 之类的速记。正确的用法是 <textarea spellcheck="true"></textarea> 。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Whatwg.org definition specifies that an itemid must be a URL. However, the following example correctly illustrates that a URN may also be used. This inconsistency may reflect the incomplete nature of the Microdata specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Whatwg.org定义指定 itemid 必须是URL。但是，以下示例正确地说明了也可以使用URN。这种不一致可能反映了微数据规范的不完整性质。

trans-unit.source: Note: The abbreviation for each image format links to a longer description of the format, its capabilities, and detailed browser compatibility information (including which versions introduced support and specific special features that may have been introduced later).
trans-unit.target: 注意：每种图像格式的缩写都指向该格式的详细说明，其功能以及详细的浏览器兼容性信息（包括所引入的版本支持和稍后可能引入的特定特殊功能）。

trans-unit.source: Note: The common use of a triangle which rotates or twists around to represent opening or closing the widget is why these are sometimes called "twisties."
trans-unit.target: 注意：三角形的常见用法是旋转或扭曲以表示打开或关闭窗口小部件，因此有时将它们称为“扭曲”。

trans-unit.source: Note: The line feed (U+000A) and carriage return (U+000D) characters are not permitted in a "password" value. When setting the value of a password control, line feed and carriage return characters are stripped out of the value.
trans-unit.target: 注意： "password" 值中不允许换行（U + 000A）和回车（U + 000D）字符。设置密码控件的值时，换行符和回车符将从该值中去除。

trans-unit.source: Note: The line feed (U+000A) and carriage return (U+000D) characters are not permitted in a password value. When setting the value of a password control, line feed and carriage return characters are stripped out of the value.
trans-unit.target: 注意： password 值中不允许换行（U + 000A）和回车（U + 000D）字符。设置密码控件的值时，换行符和回车符将从该值中去除。

trans-unit.source: Note: The maximum value for tabindex is 32767. If not specified, it takes the default value 0.
trans-unit.target: 注意： tabindex 的最大值为32767。如果未指定，则默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: Note: The older formats like PNG, JPEG, GIF have poor performance compared to newer formats like WebP and AVIF, but enjoy broader "historical" browser support. The newer image formats are seeing increasing popularity as browers without support become increasingly irrelevant (i.e. have virually zero market share).
trans-unit.target: 注意：与较新的格式（如WebP和AVIF）相比，较旧的格式（如PNG，JPEG，GIF）的性能较差，但具有更广泛的“历史”浏览器支持。由于没有支持的浏览器变得越来越不相关（即市场份额几乎为零），因此更新的图像格式正越来越受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: Note: There is no guarantee, though, that color-adjust: exact will result in your CSS being used exactly as given. If the browser provides user preferences to change the output (such as a "don't print backgrounds" checkbox in a print dialog box), that overrides the value of color-adjust.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不过，我们无法保证 color-adjust: exact 会导致CSS的使用完全如给定。如果浏览器提供了用于更改输出的用户首选项（例如，打印对话框中的“不打印背景”复选框），则会覆盖 color-adjust 的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: This has been standardized as the global attribute enterkeyhint, but is not yet widely implemented. To see the status of the change being implemented in Firefox, see bug 1490661.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这已经标准化为全局属性 enterkeyhint ，但是尚未得到广泛实现。要查看正在Firefox中实施的更改的状态，请参见错误1490661。

trans-unit.source: Note: This has been standardized as the global attribute enterkeyhint, but is not yet widely implemented. To see the status of the change being implemented in Firefox, see bug 1490661.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这已经标准化为全局属性 enterkeyhint ，但是尚未得到广泛实现。要查看正在Firefox中实施的更改的状态，请参见bug 1490661。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute has been deprecated; use the CSS list-style-type property instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该属性已被弃用。请改用CSS list-style-type 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is allowed only if the <img> element is a descendant of an <a> element with a valid href attribute.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当 <img> 元素是具有有效 href 属性的 <a> 元素的后代时，才允许使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is allowed only if the <img> element is a descendant of an <a> element with a valid href attribute. This gives users without pointing devices a fallback destination.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当 <img> 元素是具有有效 href 属性的 <a> 元素的后代时，才允许使用此属性。这为没有指点设备的用户提供了备用目标。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is applied on the attributes of the column group, it has no effect on the CSS styling rules associated with it or, even more, to the cells of the column's members of the group.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性应用于列组的属性，对与其关联的CSS样式规则没有影响，甚至对列组的成员的单元格没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is considered obsolete by the WHATWG HTML living standard (which is the specification MDN treats as canonical). However, it's worth noting that rev is not considered obsolete in the W3C specification. That said, given the uncertainty, relying on rev is unwise.
trans-unit.target: 注意： WHATWG HTML生活标准（MDN将其视为规范的规范）认为该属性已过时。但是，值得注意的是，在W3C规范中， rev 不是过时的。就是说，鉴于不确定性，依靠 rev 是不明智的。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is mentioned in the latest W3C version, HTML 5.2, but has been removed from the WHATWG’s HTML Living Standard. It has an uncertain future; authors should use a WAI-ARIA alternative such as aria-describedby or aria-details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性在最新的W3C版本HTML 5.2中有所提及，但已从WHATWG的HTML Living Standard中删除。它的前途未卜；作者应使用WAI - ARIA替代方法，例如 aria-describedby 或 aria-details 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is mentioned in the latest W3C version, HTML 5.2, but has been removed from the WHATWG’s HTML Living Standard. It has an uncertain future; authors should use a WAI-ARIA alternative such as aria-describedby or aria-details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该属性在最新的W3C版本HTML 5.2中有所提及，但已从WHATWG的HTML Living Standard中删除。它的前途未卜；作者应使用WAI-ARIA替代方法，例如 aria-describedby 或 aria-details 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is obsolete and should not be used by authors. Use the HTTP Content-Type header on the linked URL.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该属性已过时，作者不能使用。在链接的URL上使用HTTP Content-Type 标头。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute is obsolete, use <link rel="manifest"> instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性已过时，请改用 <link rel="manifest"> 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute was deprecated in HTML4, but reintroduced in HTML5.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性在HTML4中已弃用，但在HTML5中重新引入。

trans-unit.source: Note: This element has been removed from the specification. See this for more information from the editor of the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此元素已从规范中删除。见这从规范的编辑器的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: This element has been removed from the specification. See this for more information from the editor of the specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此元素已从规范中删除。见这从规范的编辑器的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is a legacy attribute. Please use the CSS background-color property instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是旧版属性。请改用CSS background-color 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is a legacy attribute. Please use the CSS border property instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是旧版属性。请改用CSS border 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is a legacy attribute. Please use the CSS color property instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是一个旧属性。请改用CSS color 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: This link type should not be set on links to a member of a tag cloud as these do not apply to a single document but to a set of pages.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不应在指向标签云成员的链接上设置此链接类型，因为这些链接不适用于单个文档，而不适用于一组页面。

trans-unit.source: Note: This may be a mailto: hyperlink, but this is not recommended on public pages as robot harvesters will quickly lead to a lot of spam sent to the address. In that case, it is better to lead to a page containing a contact form.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这可能是 mailto: 超链接，但是不建议在公共页面上使用，因为机器人收割机会迅速导致大量垃圾邮件发送到该地址。在这种情况下，最好转到包含联系表格的页面。

trans-unit.source: Note: This topic documents only the element that is defined as part of HTML5. It does not address earlier, non-standardized implementation of the element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：本主题仅记录定义为HTML5一部分的元素。它没有解决该元素的早期，非标准化实现。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though originally implemented only for WebKit-based browsers, webkitdirectory is also usable in Microsoft Edge as well as Firefox 50 and later. However, even though it has relatively broad support, it is still not standard and should not be used unless you have no alternative.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然最初只为基于WebKit的浏览器实现，但 webkitdirectory 也可以在Microsoft Edge以及Firefox 50及更高版本中使用。但是，即使它具有相对广泛的支持，它仍然不是标准的，除非您别无选择，否则不应该使用它。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unfortunately, at this time there's no built-in way to animate the transition between open and closed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不幸的是，目前没有内置的方法可以为打开和关闭之间的过渡设置动画。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unless the type of the list number matters (like legal or technical documents where items are referenced by their number/letter), use the CSS list-style-type property instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：除非列表编号的类型重要（例如法律或技术文档，其中按编号/字母引用项目），否则请使用CSS list-style-type 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike other input controls, a checkboxes and radio buttons value are only included in the submitted data if they are currently checked. If they are, the name and the value(s) of the checked controls are submitted.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与其他输入控件不同，复选框和单选按钮的值仅在当前处于 checked 时才包括在提交的数据中。如果是，则提交已检查控件的名称和值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike other input controls, a checkboxes value is only included in the submitted data if the checkbox is currently checked. If it is, then the value of the checkbox's value attribute is reported as the input's value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与其他输入控件不同，如果当前 checked 复选框，则复选框值仅包含在提交的数据中。如果是，则将复选框的 value 属性的值报告为输入的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike other input controls, checkboxes and radio buttons are only included in the submitted data if the checkbox or radio button is currently checked. If it is, then the value attribute is reported as the input's value.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与其他输入控件不同，仅当复选框或单选按钮当前处于 checked ，复选框和单选按钮才包含在提交的数据中。如果是，则将 value 属性报告为输入的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Unlike the <meter> element, the minimum value is always 0, and the min attribute is not allowed for the <progress> element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：与 <meter> 元素不同，最小值始终为0，并且 <progress> 元素不允许使用 min 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Use the <area> element for image maps instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：将 <area> 元素用于图像地图。

trans-unit.source: Note: Use the usemap attribute for the <img> element and the associated <map> element to define hotspots instead of the shape attribute.
trans-unit.target: 注意：将 usemap 属性用于 <img> 元素和关联的 <map> 元素来定义热点，而不是 shape 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Use the global attribute id instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请改用全局属性 id 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Use these properties on the child <img> element, not the <picture> element.
trans-unit.target: 注：使用对孩子这些属性 <img> 元素，不是的 <picture> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: Using characters except ASCII letters, digits, '_', '-' and '.' may cause compatibility problems, as they weren't allowed in HTML 4. Though this restriction has been lifted in HTML5, an ID should start with a letter for compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用除ASCII字母，数字， '_' ， '-' 和 '.' 以外的字符。可能会导致兼容性问题，这是HTML 4中不允许的。尽管HTML5中取消了此限制，但ID应当以字母开头以确保兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Using characters except ASCII letters, digits, '_', '-' and '.' may cause compatibility problems, as they weren't allowed in HTML 4. Though this restriction has been lifted in HTML 5, an ID should start with a letter for compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用除ASCII字母，数字， '_' ， '-' 和 '.' 以外的字符。可能会导致兼容性问题，因为HTML 4中不允许这样做。尽管HTML 5中取消了此限制，但ID应当以字母开头以确保兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Using this attribute with a table cell element is obsolete in the latest standard. Use this attribute only with the <th> element to define the row or column for which it is a header.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在最新标准中，将此属性与表格单元元素一起使用已过时。仅将此属性与 <th> 元素一起使用，以定义其为标题的行或列。

trans-unit.source: Note: When the data entered by the user doesn't adhere to the maximum value set, the value is considered invalid in contraint validation and will match the :invalid and :out-of-range pseudo-classes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果用户输入的数据不符合设置的最大值，则该值在约束验证中被视为无效，并且将与 :invalid 和 :out-of-range 伪类匹配。

trans-unit.source: Note: When the data entered by the user doesn't adhere to the min value set, the value is considered invalid in contraint validation and will match the :invalid pseudoclass
trans-unit.target: 注意：当用户输入的数据不符合最小值设置时，该值在约束验证中被认为是无效的，并且将与 :invalid 伪类匹配

trans-unit.source: Note: When the data entered by the user doesn't adhere to the stepping configuration, the user agent may round to the nearest valid value, preferring numbers in the positive direction when there are two equally close options.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当用户输入的数据不遵循步进配置时，用户代理可能会舍入到最接近的有效值，当有两个相等的接近选项时，首选在正方向上的数字。

trans-unit.source: Note: When the data entered by the user doesn't adhere to the stepping configuration, the value is considered invalid in constraint validation and will match the :invalid and :out-of-range pseudoclasses
trans-unit.target: 注意：当用户输入的数据不遵循步进配置时，该值在约束验证中被视为无效，并且将与 :invalid 和 :out-of-range 伪类匹配

trans-unit.source: Note: When the data entered by the user doesn't adhere to the stepping configuration, the value is considered invalid in contraint validation and will match the :invalid pseudoclass.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果用户输入的数据不遵循步进配置，则该值在约束验证中被视为无效，并且将与 :invalid 伪类匹配。

trans-unit.source: Note: When the user clicks the button, the required attribute(s) are removed from the input(s) we are hiding, and empty the value attribute(s). This is so the form can be submitted if both input sets aren't filled in. It also ensures that the form won't submit data that the user didn't mean to.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当用户单击按钮时， required 属性将从我们隐藏的输入中删除，并清空 value 属性。这样一来，如果未同时填写两个输入集，则可以提交表单。这还可以确保表单不会提交用户不想要的数据。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using target, add rel="noreferrer noopener" to avoid exploitation of the window.opener API;
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 target 时，请添加 rel="noreferrer noopener" 以避免利用 window.opener API。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using target, consider adding rel="noreferrer" to avoid exploitation of the window.opener API.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 target 时，请考虑添加 rel="noreferrer" 以避免利用 window.opener API。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also use the next keyword to specify a link to the next page in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您还可以使用 next 关键字指定到序列中下一页的链接。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can use href="#top" or the empty fragment (href="#") to link to the top of the current page, as defined in the HTML specification.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以使用 href="#top" 或空片段（ href="#" ）链接到当前页面的顶部，如HTML规范中所定义。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can use href="#top" or the empty fragment href="#" to link to the top of the current page. This behavior is specified by HTML5.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以使用 href="#top" 或空白片段 href="#" 链接到当前页面的顶部。此行为由HTML5指定。

trans-unit.source: Note: You don't need to do all this wrapping; you can choose to simplify it by leaving out the external <kbd> element. In other words, simplifying this to just <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>N</kbd> would be perfectly valid.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不需要做所有这些包装；您可以选择省略外部 <kbd> 元素来简化它。换句话说，将其简化为 <kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>N</kbd> 是完全有效的。

trans-unit.source: Note: if the X-Pingback: HTTP header is also present, it supersedes the <link> element with this link type.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果还存在 X-Pingback: HTTP标头，则它将使用此链接类型代替 <link> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Note: the attribute name has a specific meaning for the <meta> element, and the itemprop attribute must not be set on the same <meta> element that has any existing name, http-equiv or charset attributes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：属性 name 对 <meta> 元素具有特定的含义，并且不能在具有任何现有 name ， http-equiv 或 charset 属性的同一 <meta> 元素上设置 itemprop 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: the global attribute name has a specific meaning for the <meta> element, and the itemprop attribute must not be set on the same <meta> element that has any existing name, http-equiv or charset attributes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：全局属性 name 对 <meta> 元素具有特定含义，并且不能在具有任何现有 name ， http-equiv 或 charset 属性的同一 <meta> 元素上设置 itemprop 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: the rules above disallow ":" characters in non-URL values because otherwise they could not be distinguished from URLs. Values with "." characters are reserved for future extensions. Space characters are disallowed because otherwise the values would be parsed as multiple tokens.
trans-unit.target: 注意：上面的规则禁止在非URL值中使用“：”字符，因为否则它们无法与URL区分开。带有“。”的值。保留字符以供将来扩展。不允许使用空格字符，因为否则会将值解析为多个标记。

trans-unit.source: Note:opacity is used to hide the file input instead of visibility: hidden or display: none, because assistive technology interprets the latter two styles to mean the file input isn't interactive.
trans-unit.target: 注意： opacity 用于隐藏文件输入而不是 visibility: hidden 或 display: none ，因为辅助技术将后两种样式解释为意味着文件输入不是交互式的。

trans-unit.source: Note:<head> primarily holds information for machine processing, not human-readability. For human-visible information, like top-level headings and listed authors, see the <header> element.
trans-unit.target: 注意： <head> 主要保存用于机器处理的信息，而不是人类可读的信息。有关人类可见的信息（例如顶级标题和列出的作者），请参见 <header> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Note:capture was previously a Boolean attribute which, if present, requested that the device's media capture device(s) such as camera or microphone be used instead of requesting a file input.

trans-unit.source: Note: Checkboxes are similar to radio buttons, but with an important distinction: radio buttons are designed for selecting one value out of a set, whereas checkboxes let you turn individual values on and off. Where multiple controls exist, radio buttons allow one to be selected out of them all, whereas checkboxes allow multiple values to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 注意：复选框类似于单选按钮，但有一个重要区别：单选按钮设计用于从集合中选择一个值，而复选框则可用于打开和关闭各个值。如果存在多个控件，则单选按钮允许从所有控件中选择一个，而复选框则允许选择多个值。

trans-unit.source: Note: Radio buttons are similar to checkboxes, but with an important distinction — radio buttons are grouped into a set in which only one radio button can be selected at a time, whereas checkboxes allow you to turn single values on and off. Where multiple controls exist, radio buttons allow one to be selected out of them all, whereas checkboxes allow multiple values to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 注意：单选按钮类似于复选框，但有一个重要区别-单选按钮被分组为一组，一次只能选择一个单选按钮，而复选框则允许您打开和关闭单个值。如果存在多个控件，则单选按钮允许从所有控件中选择一个，而复选框则允许选择多个值。

trans-unit.source: Note: An empty string value ("") is both the default value, and a fallback value if referrerpolicy is not supported. If referrerpolicy is not explicitly specified on the <script> element, it will adopt a higher-level referrer policy, i.e. one set on the whole document or domain. If a higher-level policy is not available, the empty string is treated as being equivalent to no-referrer-when-downgrade.
trans-unit.target: 注意：空字符串值（ "" ）既是默认值，又是回退值（如果不支持 referrerpolicy ）。如果没有在 <script> 元素上明确指定 referrerpolicy ，它将采用更高级别的Referrer策略，即在整个文档或域上设置一个。如果没有更高级别的策略，则将空字符串视为等同于 no-referrer-when-downgrade 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Any forms involving sensitive information like passwords (e.g. login forms) should be served over HTTPS; Firefox now implements multiple mechanisms to warn against insecure login forms — see Insecure passwords. Other browsers are also implementing similar mechanisms.

trans-unit.source: Note: HTML form validation is not a substitute for scripts that ensure that the entered data is in the proper format. It's far too easy for someone to make adjustments to the HTML that allow them to bypass the validation, or to remove it entirely. It's also possible for someone to simply bypass your HTML entirely and submit the data directly to your server. If your server-side code fails to validate the data it receives, disaster could strike when improperly-formatted data (or data which is too large, is of the wrong type, and so forth) is entered into your database.
trans-unit.target: 注：HTML表单验证是不为脚本，确保输入的数据是正确的格式的替代品。对于某人来说，对HTML进行调整以使其绕过验证或完全删除验证太容易了。有人也可以完全绕过您的HTML并将数据直接提交到您的服务器。如果您的服务器端代码无法验证接收到的数据，则当将格式不正确的数据（或太大，类型错误的数据等等）输入数据库时​​，灾难可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: Note: HTML form validation is not a substitute for server-scripts that ensure the entered data is in the proper format. It's far too easy for someone to make adjustments to the HTML that allow them to bypass the validation, or to remove it entirely. It's also possible for someone to simply bypass your HTML entirely and submit the data directly to your server. If your server-side code fails to validate the data it receives, disaster could strike when improperly-formatted data (or data which is too large, is of the wrong type, and so forth) is entered into your database.
trans-unit.target: 注：HTML表单验证是不是服务器的脚本，以确保输入的数据是正确的格式的替代品。对于某人来说，对HTML进行调整以使其绕过验证或完全删除验证太容易了。有人也可以完全绕过您的HTML并将数据直接提交到您的服务器。如果您的服务器端代码无法验证接收到的数据，则当将格式不正确的数据（或太大，类型错误的数据等等）输入数据库时​​，灾难可能会发生。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a checkbox is unchecked when its form is submitted, there is no value submitted to the server to represent its unchecked state (e.g. value=unchecked); the value is not submitted to the server at all.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果提交表单时未选中复选框，则没有任何值提交到服务器以表示其未选中状态（例如 value=unchecked ）；该值根本不会提交给服务器。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a checkbox is unchecked when its form is submitted, there is no value submitted to the server to represent its unchecked state (e.g. value=unchecked); the value is not submitted to the server at all. If you wanted to submit a default value for the checkbox when it is unchecked, you could include an <input type="hidden"> inside the form with the same name and value, generated by JavaScript perhaps.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果提交表单时未选中复选框，则没有任何值提交到服务器以表示其未选中状态（例如 value=unchecked ）；该值根本不会提交给服务器。如果要在未选中复选框的情况下提交复选框的默认值，则可以在表单内部包含一个具有相同 name 和 value 的<input type =“ hidden”>，这可能是由JavaScript生成的。

trans-unit.source: Note: If no radio button is selected when the form is submitted, the radio group is not included in the submitted form data at all, since there is no value to report.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在提交表单时未选择任何单选按钮，则由于没有要报告的值，因此单选组根本不包含在提交的表单数据中。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you put the checked attribute on more than one radio button, later instances will override earlier ones; that is, the last checked radio button will be the one that is selected. This is because only one radio button in a group can ever be selected at once, and the user agent automatically deselects others each time a new one is marked as checked.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果将 checked 属性放在多个单选按钮上，则以后的实例将覆盖以前的实例；否则，实例将被替换。也就是说，最后 checked 单选按钮将被选中。这是因为一次只能选择一个组中的一个单选按钮，并且每次将新按钮标记为已选中时，用户代理都会自动取消选择其他按钮。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you run into trouble while writing your validation regular expressions and they're not working properly, check your browser's console; there may be helpful error messages there to aid you in solving the problem.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在编写验证正则表达式时遇到麻烦，但它们不能正常工作，请检查浏览器的控制台；否则，请执行以下步骤。那里可能会有有用的错误消息，以帮助您解决问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you submit a form with an indeterminate checkbox, the same thing happens as if the checkbox were unchecked — no data is submitted to represent the checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您提交的表单带有不确定的复选框，则与未选中该复选框时会发生相同的事情-不会提交任何数据来表示该复选框。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you submit a form with an indeterminate checkbox, the same thing happens as if the form were unchecked — no data is submitted to represent the checkbox.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您提交的表单带有不确定的复选框，则会发生与未选中该表单相同的事情-没有数据提交来表示该复选框。

trans-unit.source: Note: In the WHATWG spec it says you can specify multiple space-separated characters, and the browser will use the first one it supports. However, this does not work in most browsers. In IE/Edge it will use the first one it supports without problem, provided there are no conflicts with other commands.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在WHATWG规范中，您可以指定多个以空格分隔的字符，浏览器将使用它支持的第一个字符。但是，这不适用于大多数浏览器。在IE / Edge中，只要与其他命令没有冲突，它将使用它支持的第一个版本。

trans-unit.source: Note: In the WHATWG spec, it says you can specify multiple space-separated characters, and the browser will use the first one it supports. However, this does not work in most browsers. IE/Edge uses the first one it supports without problems, provided there are no conflicts with other commands.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在WHATWG规范中，它说您可以指定多个以空格分隔的字符，并且浏览器将使用它支持的第一个字符。但是，这不适用于大多数浏览器。如果与其他命令没有冲突，IE / Edge会使用它所支持的第一个版本，而不会出现问题。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's also crucial to remember that a user can tinker with your HTML behind the scenes, so your site must not use this validation for any security purposes. You must verify the URL on the server-side of any transaction in which the provided text may have any security implications of any kind.
trans-unit.target: 注意：记住用户可以在后台修改HTML也是至关重要的，因此您的网站不得出于任何安全目的使用此验证。您必须在任何事务的服务器端验证URL，其中所提供的文本可能具有任何类型的安全隐患。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's also crucial to remember that a user can tinker with your HTML behind the scenes, so your site must not use this validation for any security purposes. You must verify the e-mail address on the server side of any transaction in which the provided text may have any security implications of any kind.
trans-unit.target: 注意：记住用户可以在后台修改HTML也是至关重要的，因此您的网站不得出于任何安全目的使用此验证。您必须在任何事务的服务器端验证电子邮件地址，其中提供的文本可能具有任何类型的安全隐患。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's crucial to remember that a user can tinker with your HTML behind the scenes, so your site must not use simple client-side validation for any security purposes. You must verify on the server side any transaction in which the provided value may have any security implications of any kind.
trans-unit.target: 注意：切记，用户可以在后台修改HTML，因此至关重要，因此，出于任何安全目的，您的网站不得使用简单的客户端验证。您必须在服务器端验证任何交易，在该交易中所提供的值可能具有任何种类的安全隐患。

trans-unit.source: Note: Setting the value to anything that isn't a valid, fully-opaque, RGB color in hexadecimal notation will result in the value being set to "#000000". In particular, you can't use CSS's standardized color names, or any CSS function syntax, to set the value. This makes sense when you keep in mind that HTML and CSS are separate languages and specifications. In addition, colors with an alpha channel are not supported; specifying a color in 9-character hexadecimal notation (e.g. #009900aa) will also result in the color being set to "#000000".
trans-unit.target: 注意：以十六进制表示法将值设置为不是有效的，完全不透明的RGB颜色的任何值都将导致该值设置为 "#000000" 。特别是，您不能使用CSS的标准化颜色名称或任何CSS函数语法来设置值。当您记住HTML和CSS是独立的语言和规范时，这很有意义。此外，不支持带有Alpha通道的颜色。以9个字符的十六进制表示法指定颜色（例如 #009900aa ）也将导致颜色设置为 "#000000" 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Setting the value to anything that isn't a valid, fully-opaque, RGB color in hexadecimal notation will result in the value being set to #000000. In particular, you can't use CSS's standardized color names, or any CSS function syntax, to set the value. This makes sense when you keep in mind that HTML and CSS are separate languages and specifications. In addition, colors with an alpha channel are not supported; specifying a color in 9-character hexadecimal notation (e.g. #009900aa) will also result in the color being set to #000000.
trans-unit.target: 注意：以十六进制表示法将值设置为不是有效的，完全不透明的RGB颜色的任何值，将导致该值设置为 #000000 。特别是，您不能使用CSS的标准化颜色名称或任何CSS函数语法来设置值。当您牢记HTML和CSS是独立的语言和规范时，这很有意义。另外，不支持带有Alpha通道的颜色。以9个字符的十六进制表示法指定颜色（例如 #009900aa ）也将导致颜色设置为 #000000 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Simply omitting master entries (files that have the manifest attribute set in the html element) from the manifest file would not have the same result, because master entries will be added—and subsequently served from—the application cache.

trans-unit.source: Note: Sites that automatically play audio (or video with an audio track) can be an unpleasant experience for users, so it should be avoided when possible. If you must offer autoplay functionality, you should make it opt-in (requiring a user to specifically enable it). However, this can be useful when creating media elements whose source will be set at a later time, under user control.
trans-unit.target: 注意：自动播放音频（或带有音频轨道的视频）的站点可能会给用户带来不愉快的体验，因此应尽可能避免使用。如果必须提供自动播放功能，则应启用它（要求用户专门启用它）。但是，这在创建媒体元素时很有用，该媒体元素的来源将在以后由用户控制。

trans-unit.source: Note: Sites that automatically play audio (or videos with an audio track) can be an unpleasant experience for users, so should be avoided when possible. If you must offer autoplay functionality, you should make it opt-in (requiring a user to specifically enable it). However, this can be useful when creating media elements whose source will be set at a later time, under user control.
trans-unit.target: 注意：自动播放音频（或带有音轨的视频）的网站可能会给用户带来不愉快的体验，因此应尽可能避免使用。如果必须提供自动播放功能，则应启用它（要求用户专门启用它）。但是，这在创建媒体元素时很有用，该媒体元素的来源将在以后由用户控制。

trans-unit.source: Note: Sites that automatically play audio (or videos with an audio track) can be an unpleasant experience for users, so should be avoided when possible. If you must offer autoplay functionality, you should make it opt-in (requiring a user to specifically enable it). However, this can be useful when creating media elements whose source will be set at a later time, under user control. See our autoplay guide for additional information about how to properly use autoplay.
trans-unit.target: 注意：自动播放音频（或带有音轨的视频）的网站可能会给用户带来不愉快的体验，因此应尽可能避免使用。如果必须提供自动播放功能，则应启用它（要求用户专门启用它）。但是，这在创建媒体元素时很有用，该媒体元素的来源将在以后由用户控制。有关如何正确使用自动播放的其他信息，请参见我们的自动播放指南。

trans-unit.source: Note: The above attributes do affect Validation — the above example's inputs will count as invalid if the length of the value is less than 9 characters, or more than 14. Most browser won't even let you enter a value over the max length.
trans-unit.target: 注意：上面的属性确实会影响验证 -如果值的长度小于9个字符或大于14个字符，则上面示例的输入将被视为无效。大多数浏览器甚至不允许您输入超过最大长度的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The above code snippet is taken from All world timezones in an HTML select element.
trans-unit.target: 注意：上面的代码段摘自HTML选择元素中的“所有世界”时区。

trans-unit.target: 注意：字段集的标题由嵌套在其中的第一个 <legend> 元素给出。

trans-unit.source: Note: The problem with the above example of course is that the user will not know what the access key is! In a real site, you'd have to provide this information in a way that doesn't intefere with the site design (for example by providing an easily accessible link that points to information on what the site accesskeys are).
trans-unit.target: 注意：上面示例的问题当然是用户将不知道访问密钥是什么！在实际站点中，您必须以不影响站点设计的方式提供此信息（例如，通过提供易于访问的链接来指向有关站点访问键的信息）。

trans-unit.source: Note: There are known specification issues related to international domain names and the validation of e-mail addresses in HTML. See W3C bug 15489 for details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：存在与国际域名和HTML中的电子邮件地址验证有关的已知规范问题。有关详细信息，请参见W3C错误15489。

trans-unit.source: Note: There's more detail about these values and the web features they expect to be consumed by in the Preload spec — see link element extensions. Also note that the full list of values the as attribute can take is governed by the Fetch spec — see request destinations.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在Preload规范中，有关于这些值和它们预期将要使用的Web功能的更多详细信息-请参阅link元素扩展。另请注意， as 属性可以采用的值的完整列表由Fetch规范控制-请参见request destinations。

trans-unit.source: Note: These attributes also affect validation; a value shorter or longer than the specified minimum/maximum lengths will be classified as invalid; in addition most browsers will simply refuse to let the user enter a value longer than the specified maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这些属性也会影响验证。小于或小于指定的最小/最大长度的值将被分类为无效；此外，大多数浏览器只会拒绝让用户输入比指定的最大长度更长的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: This attribute was deprecated in HTML4, but reintroduced in HTML5.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性在HTML4中已弃用，但在HTML5中重新引入。

trans-unit.target: 注意：这包括全局HTML属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: When multiple is used, the value is allowed to be empty.
trans-unit.target: 注：当 multiple 时，该值被允许为空。

trans-unit.source: Note: While <input> elements of type "button" are still perfectly valid HTML, the newer <button> element is now the favored way to create buttons. Given that a <button>’s label text is inserted between the opening and closing tags, you can include HTML in the label, even images.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然 "button" 类型的 <input> 元素仍然是完全有效的HTML，但是较新的 <button> 元素现在是创建按钮的首选方式。假设在开始标记和结束标记之间插入了 <button> 的标签文本，则可以在标签中甚至图像中包含HTML。

trans-unit.source: Note: While <input> elements of type button are still perfectly valid HTML, the newer <button> element is now the favored way to create buttons. Given that a <button>’s label text is inserted between the opening and closing tags, you can include HTML in the label, even images.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然类型为 button 的 <input> 元素仍然是完全有效的HTML，但是较新的 <button> 元素现在是创建按钮的首选方式。假设在开始标记和结束标记之间插入了 <button> 的标签文本，则可以在标签中甚至图像中包含HTML。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should be able to use the step attribute to vary the number of days jumped each time the date is incremented (e.g. to only make Saturdays selectable). However, this does not seem to be in any implementation at the time of writing.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您应该能够使用 step 属性来更改每次日期增加时的跳转天数（例如，仅使星期六可选）。但是，在撰写本文时，这似乎没有任何实现。

Also note that the full list of values the as attribute can take is governed by the definitions in the Fetch spec — see request destinations.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以阅读有关这些值以及预载规范中预期将要使用的Web功能的更多详细信息-请参阅链接元素扩展。还要注意， as 属性可以采用的值的完整列表由Fetch规范中的定义控制-请参见请求目的地。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can set as well as get the value of HTMLInputElement.files in all modern browsers; this was most recently added to Firefox, in version 57 (see bug 1384030).
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以在所有现代浏览器中设置并获取 HTMLInputElement.files 的值。这是最近添加到Firefox的57版中（请参见bug 1384030）。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should be able to use the step attribute to vary the number of days jumped each time the date is incremented (e.g. maybe you only want to make Saturdays selectable). However, this does not seem to work effectively in any implementation at the time of writing.

trans-unit.source: Omitted or a JavaScript MIME type: For HTML5-compliant browsers this indicates the script is JavaScript. HTML5 specification urges authors to omit the attribute rather than provide a redundant MIME type. In earlier browsers, this identified the scripting language of the embedded or imported (via the src attribute) code. JavaScript MIME types are listed in the specification.
trans-unit.target: 省略或JavaScript MIME类型：对于符合HTML5的浏览器，这表明脚本是JavaScript。HTML5规范敦促作者忽略该属性，而不是提供冗余的MIME类型。在早期的浏览器中，这标识了嵌入式或导入（通过 src 属性）代码的脚本语言。规范中列出了 JavaScript MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: Omitted or a JavaScript MIME type: This indicates the script is JavaScript. The HTML5 specification urges authors to omit the attribute rather than provide a redundant MIME type. In earlier browsers, this identified the scripting language of the embedded or imported (via the src attribute) code. JavaScript MIME types are listed in the specification.
trans-unit.target: 省略或JavaScript MIME类型：这表示脚本是JavaScript。HTML5规范敦促作者忽略该属性，而不是提供冗余的MIME类型。在早期的浏览器中，这标识了嵌入式或导入（通过 src 属性）代码的脚本语言。规范中列出了JavaScript MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: Spec conflict: The WHATWG spec lists inputmode, and modern browsers are working towards supporting it. The W3C HTML 5.2 spec however no longer lists it (i.e. marks it as obsolete). You should consider the WHATWG definition as correct, until a consensus is reached.
trans-unit.target: 规范冲突：WHATWG规范列出了 inputmode ，现代浏览器正在努力支持它。但是，W3C HTML 5.2规范不再列出它（即，将其标记为过时的）。在达成共识之前，您应该认为WHATWG定义是正确的。
